page.title: 12CLUBS
page.content: {Chelford Players.} The Chelford Players is a group which produces two plays a year.It is run by a committee and the head of the committee is Mrs.Towers.There are meetings every month.The last plays were Dick Wittington and Songs from the Shows.The plays are performed in the Parish Hall(on the A537 road). {Thursday Club. The Thursday Club,for elderley people, meets on the first Thursday of every month in the Parish Hall. Chelford School usually produces a Christmas play for the Club,but it is not performed until the Spring term. {Women's Institute (W.I.) } The W.I.is run by Mrs. Mannnering and meets at the Parish Hall on Wednesdays from eight until ten p.m.
